response.overview: Set in a high school navigating Indonesia’s new “Merdeka Curriculum,” this graduation film follows a group of students grappling with the pressures of modern education. As projects pile up and expectations rise, they begin questioning the very system that promised them freedom. Through reflection, resistance, and growth, they discover what it truly means to learn, and to be heard.
response.tagline: In a system that claims freedom, a generation dares to ask: who’s really free?
response.title: Yang Merdeka Itu Siapa?
